body.name: Liberty Imports Pull Along Garden Wagon and Gardening Tools Toy Play Set for Toddlers, Kids with Outdoor Tools, Plant Pots, Accessories

features: IMAGINARY PLAY: Ignite your child's love for gardening with this 16-piece garden wagon and tools playset, designed to spark curiosity and creativity in kids aged 3 and up.
GARDENING ADVENTURE: This comprehensive set includes 8 child-friendly gardening tools, 4 pots, a water pail, and a spray bottle, making it the perfect starter kit for your little gardener.

EASY TRANSPORT & STORAGE: Equipped with a durable garden wagon, your young gardener can effortlessly carry their tools and treasures from one spot to another, keeping everything organized and easily accessible.

HANDS-ON LEARNING EXPERIENCE: With perfectly-sized tools for small hands, this set encourages outdoor exploration, physical activity, and helps kids develop essential fine motor skills as they plant, dig, and grow.

NURTURE A LOVE FOR NATURE: This exciting gardening toy set fosters a deep appreciation for the outdoors, teaching children the joy of nurturing plants and understanding the life cycle of their very own garden.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Backyard Toy For Your Kids! A colorful plastic garden wagon set that has everything your little kid needs for big-time fun. Carry all your garden toys in this large wagon! Includes 8 different gardening tools, 3 large and 5 small. Large tools feature rank, hoe, and pick. Small tools feature spade, clipper, and 3 rakes. Also includes 2 large pots, 2 small pots, a water pail, and spray. The wagon base measures 14" x 12" x 7". The wagon handle extends 13". Fill up pots with sand or soil. This Garden Wagon Set is great for home, garden, or beach!
Package Includes: 8 gardening tools: 3 rakes (large, medium, small), garden scissor, hand shovel, hand fork, garden hoe, weeder4 Plant potsWater pailWater spray bottlePortable pull wagon

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The tools break easily.
reviews.reviewText: The wagon and some of the tools they stile have years later. The rakes broke quickly. But the small tools they still have. All in all its a great gift for kids 3 to 5 and they enjoyed it so much working beside me in my garden. We made a garden for them to tend to and they grew stuff. So its. A very good gift and I recommend it besides it gets the kids outdoors

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for little ones!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my 1 year old grand daughter. She seemed to love it, and so did her 3 & 4 year old siblings. There was a variety of toys in the wagon and they were small and easy to handle. Probably too small for anyone over 4 tho! Definitely will keep them busy outside.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Total WIN so cute
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my grandson, and he loves it! Very cute. The water bottle only squirt once and broke but since it was such a hit I don’t even mind!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Granddaughter
reviews.reviewText: This is absolutely perfect size for my 11mth old granddaughter. She loves it and uses it to pull her stuffed animals around, too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Not going to last long for the price. I hope she gets some use outta it before it breaks

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for toddlers
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my 2 year old and he loves it. It comes with all kinds of gardening play tool including a working squirt bottle! No need to assemble either.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the price!
reviews.reviewText: I was surprised how much came with this kit! The plastic is durable enough to tolerate my toddler smaking everything all over the ground, so that’s a win for me!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars One broken puece
reviews.reviewText: One take was broke but it’s for my two year old grandson so no biggee.

reviews.reviewTitle: Muy buen producto le encantó a mi niña
reviews.reviewText: Muy bien el artículo llegó muy bien y rápido
Llego muy bien y antes de lo previsto, el precio me pareció muy acorde con la calidad, agradesco al joven jhovani de atención al cliente por su amable atención
Tiene excelente tamanyo, lo unico malo es que el spray solo sirvio algunas veces, parece de mala calidad

Esta excelente la idea del vagon con los juegos para jardin, solamente que el atomizador me llegó defectuoso, no funciona y he batallado mucho para encontrar un atomizador para niños pequeños, mi bebita tiene 2 años, ojalá exista una respuesta del vendedor
Our Granddaughter loved this! We bought it for her 3rd Birthday.
